Name: Make Alyx Charple
UserPrompt: change alyx's model into models/humans/charple01.mdl and play ambient/alarms/razortrain_horn1.wav
ExecutionCode:
local alyx = nil
for _, v in pairs(ents.GetAll()) do
    if v:IsNPC() and v:GetClass() == "npc_alyx" then
        alyx = v
        break
    end
end

if IsValid(alyx) then
    alyx:SetModel("models/humans/charple01.mdl")
    alyx:EmitSound("ambient/alarms/razortrain_horn1.wav", 75, 100)
end
UndoCode:
local alyx = nil
for _, v in pairs(ents.GetAll()) do
    if v:IsNPC() and v:GetClass() == "npc_alyx" then
        alyx = v
        break
    end
end

if IsValid(alyx) then
    alyx:SetModel("models/humans/alyx.mdl")
    alyx:StopAllSounds()
end
